{"id":1219649718,"question_id":680,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1711936735,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1219649718/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"45.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    boolean check(String s, int i, int j, int count){\n        if(count>1){\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        while(i<j){\n            if(s.charAt(i)!=s.charAt(j)){\n                return check(s, i+1, j, count+1)|check(s, i, j-1, count+1);\n            }\n            i++;\n            j--;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    public boolean validPalindrome(String s) {\n        return check(s, 0, s.length()-1, 0);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
